body.en: Welcome to the Point learning kit! This is your starting point for learning about Point concepts.
body.ar: مرحباً بك في مجموعة تعلم Point! هذه نقطة البداية لتعلم مفاهيم Point.

body.en: In this kit, you will learn the fundamentals of Point and how to apply them in practical projects.
body.ar: في هذه المجموعة، سوف تتعلم أساسيات Point وكيفية تطبيقها في المشاريع العملية.

body.en: Welcome to this lesson. Here we will learn about the basics.
body.ar: Welcome to this lesson. Here we will learn about the basics.

body.en: First, make sure you have all the required materials.
body.ar: First, make sure you have all the required materials.

body.en: You will need: Arduino board, LED lights, resistors, and jumper wires.
body.ar: You will need: Arduino board, LED lights, resistors, and jumper wires.

body.en: Now let's start building our first circuit.
body.ar: Now let's start building our first circuit.
